content: Only one moment of my life was enough to manage to know and love you, but my entire life would not be enough to manage to forget you.
translations: ita:Ãˆ bastato un attimo della mia vita per riuscire a conoscerti e amarti, ma non basterebbe tutta la mia vita per riuscire
